resources.string: SELinux mode is permissive! Malicious programs can take full control of your device!
Dreamland Framework: A third-party Xposed framework, supports Android 7.0~11.
You do not have QQ installed or the version is too low.
Not support now, please try to update it or contact its developer.
This app has no main activity, so it cannot be opened.
This module has no main activity, so it cannot be opened.
"Thanks the origin Xposed framework's author rovo89, Thanks @LMFuture for providing the icon, and thanks my friends for helping me! :) "
Please wait for loading to complete…

Reboot failed. Please check the following:

 Have you granted Root permissions?

 If this does not resolve the issue, please use the device's reboot function.
Do you want to reboot the device now?

In Dreamland framework, you ’ll also need to enable the target app and forcibly stop it in the Apps page for it to take effect. If the module acts on the system, you may need to reboot the device for it to take effect.

In Dreamland framework, enabling an application simply causes the application to load all enabled modules at the next startup, so you must enable the required modules in the Modules page and forcefully stop the application to take effect; if the application is a system application, Then you may also need to reboot the device to take effect.\n\n Tip: Press and hold an application item to quickly and forcibly stop the application.
Dreamland framework is not stable. Installation may permanently damage your device. It is not recommended for ordinary users to install and use. \nDo you want to continue the installation?

We need storage permissions for download. \nGenerally, the external storage location (/sdcard/Android/<package name>/) that belongs to the application can be accessed without storage permissions, but some devices have privately modified this behavior, and cannot be used without storage permissions. Please grant these permissions for the app to function properly.
The script exits unexpectedly: exit code %d.
Dreamland framework safe mode is enabled
Dreamland framework is complete installed but not activated
Dreamland framework is broken! Please re-install or uninstall framework
The device does not currently support the dreamland framework (required min android version 5.0(SDK 21) and cpu arch is arm-v7 or arm64 and ART runtime).
Please wait framework zip download complete…
You want to uninstall Dreamland framework? You will not be able to use the features provided by the Dreamland framework.
This is a bad framework zip.
Answer to QQ Group question: canyie
If safe mode is enabled, only the core functions are enabled and no modules will be loaded.
Apply all enabled modules in almost all processes. You should not use this mode in most cases.
Enable experimental feature \"resources hook\". After enabling, some modules that require this feature (such as theming modules) will work.

The \"Module Scope\" mechanism can enable Xposed modules to take effect only in certain applications, but this is not absolute; modules may still affect other applications by controlling one application.
Do you want to quit editing? Your edits will not be saved.
This module cannot be loaded because it\'s installed on the SD card, please move it to internal storage.
The app is required for the module.
Just uninstall the \"Riru-Dreamland\" module in Magisk Manager and restart your device, and the Dreamland framework will be uninstalled.

"You will download a magisk module file, please flash it in Magisk Module or custom recovery. 

Description of download channels: 
stable: Stable version, recommended for most users. Download this version from Magisk Manager.
beta: Test version, released by the developer. 
canary: Test version, automatically builded by CI, use of the version is at your own risk. "
Telegram not installed on the device.
Partially activated %s (%d), modules that hook \"android\" won\'t work
This module doesn\'t comply with Xposed module dev doc, we think its quality is questionable.
